mapper.select: SELECT ap.id,ap.numb,ap.title,ap.description,ap.price,ap.product_detail_text,ap.example_img,ap.config,ap.price_detial,ap.type, app.id AS picture_id,app.img_url,app.mark,app.sort, ast.id AS store_id,ast.name AS store_name, ast.img_url as store_img_url FROM app_product ap, app_product_picture app, app_store ast WHERE app.product_id = ap.id AND ast.id = ap.store_id AND ap.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ap.id,ap.numb,ap.title,ap.description,ap.price,ap.product_detail_text,ap.example_img,ap.config,ap.price_detial,ap.type,ap.start_city, app.id AS picture_id,app.img_url,app.mark,app.sort, ast.id AS store_id,ast.name AS store_name, ast.img_url as store_img_url FROM app_product ap, app_product_picture app, app_store ast WHERE app.product_id = ap.id AND ast.id = ap.store_id AND ap.id = #{product_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
